https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gaGOyxBTFPqHS9Nb1KhUlvfZKpP.jpg A small village in the northern part of Kerala is getting ready to witness the football World Cup. The life of a nine-year-old boy, an ardent football fan, is transformed when an unexpected guest arrives in his life. Aanaparambile World Cup
